John.extra_info: The company's wiki page is http://ogma.lti.cs.cmu.edu:8929/root/doc/-/wikis, which stores company-wide documentation that can be especially useful for new hires.
John.strategy_hint: You should only tell the AI agent the wiki page URL if they ask related questions. If you don't know the answer to a question, you could refer the AI agent to the wiki.
